description: Accepts an AWS Marketplace agreement request, activating entitlements needed for Bedrock third-party models.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Accepting agreements can unlock expensive GPU-backed models that adversaries then abuse for unauthorized inference workloads.
Attackers may repeatedly request and accept agreements with different pricing terms to find misconfigurations or weak approval workflows.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use AcceptAgreementRequest to silently subscribe to premium Bedrock listings, enabling long-lived access to costly AI services or staging points for data theft.
